data.title: Block World: The Movie (2025 film)/Credits
authors: Contributors to JH Movie Collection Wiki
data.meta_description: Full Credits for Block World: The Movie (2025). Dreamworks Presents in Association WithRelativity Media Directed by Joel Crawford Co-Director Faryn Pearl Produced by Rebecca Huntley, p.g.a. Lisa Stewart, p.g.a. Executive Producer Mike Mitchell Written by Jonathan Aibel & Glenn Berger and Pam...
